title: Marketing Website Plan for Noted App

overview.purpose: Create a marketing landing page to showcase Noted app features, drive downloads, and improve SEO/discoverability
targetAudience: Users looking for simple note-taking apps
goals: Provide download instructions for all platforms

reasoning: Ships zero JavaScript by default (perfect for marketing)
Excellent Core Web Vitals out of the box
Component islands pattern for selective interactivity
stylingReason: Can share design tokens/colors from main app
deploymentReason: Already using Vercel for main app

cons: Likely overkill for simple marketing page
alternativeWithCMS.useCase: If marketing team needs frequent content updates

qwik.description: Innovative framework with 'resumability' - instant interactivity without hydration
strengths: Loads JS only when needed (similar to Astro)
Great for complex apps with lots of interactivity
Zero hydration cost for React/Vue components
weaknesses: More complex than needed for simple marketing sites
Better suited for e-commerce or interactive apps
qwik.recommendation: Skip for Noted marketing page - Astro is simpler and more established

cmsExplanation.definition: Content Management System - tool that lets non-technical people edit website content without touching code
cmsExplanation.example: Instead of editing HTML to change '10 features' to '15 features', you use a visual editor/admin panel

decapCMS.description: Formerly Netlify CMS - Free, git-based, no backend needed

sanity.bestFor: Teams needing structured content and collaboration

probablyNo: Simple, static content (features, pricing, download links)
You're technical and comfortable editing code
probablyYes: Marketing team needs to update content frequently
Multiple people need to edit without knowing code

cmsExplanation.recommendationForNoted: Skip CMS. Use Astro with markdown files - easy to edit, no extra complexity

sections.name: Features
content: Highlight key features (folders, themes, offline, PWA)
Focus on benefits, not just features

sections.name: Download/Install
content: Can reuse content from app's Download Card

sections.name: Privacy & Security
content: Highlight Supabase RLS and user data protection

sections.name: FAQ (optional)
content: Common questions about PWA, offline mode, sync

phase1.name: Setup
tasks: Create new Astro project (npx create astro@latest)

phase2.name: Design & Content
tasks: Extract design tokens from main app (colors, fonts)
Write marketing copy for each section

phase3.name: Development
tasks: Build page sections with Astro components

phase4.name: SEO & Performance
tasks: Add meta descriptions and Open Graph tags

metaTags.title: Noted - Simple, Private Note-Taking App
metaTags.description: Cross-platform note-taking app with folders, themes, and offline support. Install as a PWA on iOS, Android, and Desktop.

branding.colors: Reuse theme colors from main app (can showcase theme variety)
branding.typography: Match app fonts or use complementary web fonts
branding.logo: Use existing noted-white.png or create marketing variant

designConsiderations.mobileFirst: Design for mobile, enhance for desktop (PWA is mobile-first)

futureEnhancements.blog: Add blog for updates, tips, tutorials (use Astro Content Collections)
futureEnhancements.documentation: Separate docs site or integrated docs section
futureEnhancements.ab-testing: Test different CTAs, hero copy, layouts

recommendation: Start with Astro + Tailwind for fastest development. Deploy to Vercel. Skip CMS unless you have a marketing team. Focus on clear value proposition and strong CTAs. Optimize for SEO and Core Web Vitals from day one.
